statements: SELECT * FROM geolocation_info;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_info WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
SELECT * FROM geolocation_info ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM geolocation_info WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT location_id, campaign_name FROM geolocation_info WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT location_id, campaign_name FROM geolocation_info WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -80.0
SELECT * FROM geolocation_info WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2023-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM geolocation_info WHERE location_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, campaign_name FROM geolocation_info WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, campaign_name FROM geolocation_info GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_latitude DESC
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT advertiser_name, budget FROM campaign_data ORDER BY budget DESC, advertiser_name ASC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 35.0 AND longitude < -120.0;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, advertiser_name, start_date FROM campaign_data WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT gd.latitude, cd.campaign_name FROM geolocation_data gd JOIN campaign_data cd ON gd.campaign_id = cd.id;
SELECT DISTINCT cd.advertiser_name FROM campaign_data cd WHERE cd.budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_image_url FROM Ads WHERE ad_clicks > 100 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_clicks FROM Ads WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT ad_name, ad_clicks, location_id FROM Ads WHERE ad_clicks > 100;
SELECT ad_name, ad_image_url FROM Ads ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT address FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_id, ad_impressions.impression_time, user_data.email FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_impressions ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_impressions.campaign_id JOIN user_data ON ad_impressions.user_id = user_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, phone_number FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT ad_name, ad_content FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'banner' ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email FROM advertisers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT ad_name, ad_content, ad_type FROM ads ORDER BY ad_type DESC, ad_name ASC

SELECT ads.ad_name, campaigns.campaign_name, ad_content FROM ads JOIN ad_campaign_mapping ON ads.ad_id = ad_campaign_mapping.ad_id JOIN campaigns ON ad_campaign_mapping.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id
